column5: I was out fishing for largemouth bass in the Kawarthas last weekend and brought my new Gopro camera with me. Manage to catch some action on video. The fish are still in the shallow stuff and they are very active. The bigger fish were caught in the evening when my Gopro went out of batteries but still got some good footage.  Enjoy!  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r6KPKjtu8j8
Nice vid man!  Frog fishing has been great this fall!
Thanks. I agree. I was still catching them yesterday on frogs.  Nice vid man!  Frog fishing has been great this fall!
Water temps around here are still in the low 60's, topwater bite has been really good.
Cool vid  Maybe for Christmas I might ask Santa for a GoPro...And a few spare batteries.LOL
